required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Intra-stent Tissue Evaluation Within BMS and DES > 3 Years Since Implantation
clinical_study.official_title: Intra-stent Tissue Evaluation Within BMS and DES > 3 Years Since Implantation

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to test the hypothesis that plaque composition differs within a stent between bare metal stents and drug eluting stents (DES). It is possible that a difference in plaque composition seen within a stent may be contributory to the late thrombotic events seen more frequently with DES.

primary_outcome.description: This study aims to test the hypothesis that plaque composition differs within the stent between BMS and DES. It is possible that a difference in plaque composition seen within the stent may be contributory to the late thrombotic events seen more frequently with DES.

arm_group.description: Patients who received a DES stent > 3 years ago.
Patients who received BMS stents > 3 years ago.

study_pop.textblock: A total of 40 subjects will be enrolled in the study, with 20 patients who previously received BMS > 3 years ago and 20 patients who previously received DES > 3 years ago
